column1: I ordered for dry paneer tikka and got paneer tikka with gravy. When i called the restaurant they told me they don't make dry paneer tikka.
Not gravy at all should be a gravy it was dry

Told specifically not to add cream in sev bhaji but it was still there. Expected bhaji to be medium spicy but it was sweet and dal was also very oily
one of the best restaurant to have veg items such as papad churi and many more and thanks to my friend sandesh he is the main owner for the great Delhi bhojanalaya and to serve best food 🙏🙏👍👍
